mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (mb_email, mb_pw, mb_name, mb_addr, mb_phone, mb_birthdate, mb_nick, joined_at, mb_type) VALUES (#{mb_Email}, #{mb_Pw}, #{mb_Name}, #{mb_Addr}, #{mb_Phone}, #{mb_Birthdate}, #{mb_Nick}, sysdate, #{mb_Type})
mapper.select: select * from members where mb_email=#{mb_Email} and mb_pw=#{mb_Pw}
